text.section: There is a Budget and Program Review Board.
The Board is responsible for determining annually the resource needs of the professional instructional program of the College.

The Board shall:
Determine the cost share for each state;
Set the proportion of costs to be funded by tuition; and
Periodically review and adjust the building use fees charged to the students of the College.

The appropriate fiscal support staff of each university, which shall include the Vice Chancellor for Administration and Finance of the University System of Maryland, shall provide fiscal support to the Board.
